p: LMH cells transfected with KPNA3 or KPNA4, and KPNA3-KO or KPNA4-KO LMH cells were infected with FAdV-4 or FA4_Del at 0.01 MOI, respectively. And then the viruses were harvested at indicated time points post-infection and stored at −80°C before use. The TCID 50 of the harvested viruses was determined in 96-well plates by serially dilution from 10 −1 to 10 −8, and calculated by Reed-Muench method.
